otupy.apps.ctxd.discovery.defaults

defaults = {'ctxd': {'frequency': 60, 'loop': -1}, 'file': {'name': 'contextdata.json', 'path': '.'}, 'kafka': {'host': '127.0.0.1', 'port': 9092, 'sasl_mechanism': None, 'sasl_plain_password': None, 'sasl_plain_username': None, 'security_protocol': 'PLAINTEXT', 'ssl_cafile': None, 'ssl_check_hostname': True, 'topic': None}, 'mongodb': {'db_name': '', 'host': '127.0.0.1', 'pass': None, 'port': 27017, 'user': None}, 'openc2': {'encoding': 'json', 'endpoint': '/.well-known/openc2', 'host': '127.0.0.1', 'port': 443, 'transfer': 'http'}}

Defaults value to be used for missing input parameters
